description: The installation of a cumulative update for SQL Server 2019 is impeded by the application of the associated security patch. When both the security patch and the cumulative update (CU) are deployed simultaneously, the presence of the security patch supersedes the CU, resulting in the CU not being installed. This can lead to inconsistencies in the SQL environment, as administrators might believe they have the latest updates when in fact the critical CU is missing. The issue is an important concern for database administrators who rely on both patches to ensure the SQL Server operates optimally and securely. It is crucial to ensure that patches are applied in the correct sequence to avoid installation conflicts.
